Name: Anvil Asgard
Description:
Manufacturer: Anvil Aerospace
Focus: Vehicle Transport
 
As the battles of today continue to grow in scale and complexity, Anvil Aerospace understands the impact a single vehicle can have on the outcome. Enter the Asgard. The next generation in ground vehicle transport, the Anvil Asgard features a quick-load ramp, a sizeable hold to securely store your assault vehicle of choice, and hefty array of armaments to ensure access to even the most combat-heavy of drop sites.
